name: Advance, Rewind, Repeat
description:
This is made for, Brackeys Game Jam "REWIND"

Battle against the rewinder machine that controlls a timeloop.

Use buttons, levers, doors and placeabel objects some of wich is unafected by the time loop, to solve the puzzels. 

The game starts out slow to teach you the mechanics, after a few levels you face "harder" puzzels.

Expected compleetion time about 5min * lack of puzzle solving skills.

---Installation---

step 1. download "RewindJam.rar" file.

step 2. unpack "RewindJam.rar" file.

step 3. navigate to "Rewind.exe" file.

step 4. run "Rewind.exe" file.

step 5. play the game.

step 6. rate the game and leave a comment.

step 7. ther is no more steps.

--- info ---

This is a gamejam game, a proof of consept and a bit of fun.

Please try it out and leave a comment for sugestions, and if you would like to see it as a full game with more features ect.
